 Terrorism is not a black and white issue, but a morally complex one. One that is not yet being addressed by Americans.

 There is a consensus in American culture that intentionally killing innocent, unarmed civilians during a war is one thing, while intentionally killing innocent, unarmed civilians when there is no "war," is something else. Then it is "terrorism."
